# GigProof

## Overview
GigProof is a Chrome extension and web app that helps gig workers generate professional income summary PDFs from earnings visible on gig platform dashboards. The PDF is generated client-side and includes compliance language stating it is user-generated and not verified. Supports 10 platforms: Uber, DoorDash, Lyft, Grubhub, Instacart, Amazon Flex, Shipt, Gopuff, Deliveroo, and Just Eat.

## Product Summary
- Chrome extension extracts earnings data from user-visible dashboard pages.
- No bank access, no credential storage, no server-side PDF generation in MVP.
- Reports are user-generated summaries intended for informational use.
- Supported platforms: Uber, DoorDash, Lyft, Grubhub, Instacart, Amazon Flex, Shipt, Gopuff, Deliveroo, and Just Eat (driver/courier dashboards).

## Support
- Contact: https://gigproof.online/contact
